explains: v. 预测，预言，预报（predict 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: predicted value 预测值；预报值

sentences.en: They predicted a severe economic downturn.
sentences.cn: 他们预言将会有一次严重的经济衰退。

sentences.en: She predicted (that) the election result would be close.
sentences.cn: 她预言选举结果将很接近。

sentences.en: Many people predicted that the party would fracture and split.
sentences.cn: 很多人预言该党将分崩离析。
